Description: Gender of the individual (1 = male, 0 = female)
Age of the individual in years
Whether the individual is a current smoker (1 = yes, 0 = no)
Average number of cigarettes smoked per day
Whether the individual is on blood pressure medication (1 = yes, 0 = no)
Whether the individual has had a stroke previously (1 = yes, 0 = no)
Whether the individual has hypertension (1 = yes, 0 = no)
Whether the individual has diabetes (1 = yes, 0 = no)
10-year risk of coronary heart disease (1 = event occurred, 0 = no event)
